S.FORM: == satangahan == u zuma a sulit hemhem 忍耐 ahebed 堅毅 u zuma a kamu u kamu nu hulam:堅毅,忍耐 u kamu nu Amilika:perseverance; patience
== satangahan == o zoma a solit hemhem 忍耐 ahebed 堅毅 o zoma a kamo o kamo no holam:堅毅,忍耐 o kamo no Amilika:perseverance; patience
